google_translated: Even if you look at that symptom, it is an adult tooth.

en_text: Then why are you here?
jp_text: じゃあ何しにきたんですか？
google_translated: Then what did you come?

en_text: Please fix her...
jp_text: 彼女を なおしてください｡
google_translated: Please do she.
